title: (x) "Progressive Democrats" Art Deco geometric sans - Dutchy Courage {Sander}
content:
Can anyone ID the font used here?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [progressive.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154033/http:/typophile.com/files/progressive.jpg) | 19.72 KB |

 [‹ (x) Alpaca Stud - Coronet {Miguel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154033/http:/typophile.com/node/17842 "Go to previous forum topic") [Serif face "Allegra Hicks" ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154033/http:/typophile.com/node/17843 "Go to next forum topic")
author: evan

comments.content:
Very close to Mostra but a few characters don’t match.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/mostra/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154033/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/mostra/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/mostra/")
You guys amaze me sometimes. Thank you. I never would have thought to look at Comic Crafts collection. They make me think of what else.. comic typestyles.
